issue.title: Quick and dirty modification of an existing vehicle

content.raw: @Paul, check if you have the `ssci_x2_sensor_config_1` folder under the`~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models` directory. If so, then edit the `model.sdf` file there and add your changes for the camera angle.  Do **not** just copy your local modified version under `/subt_ws/` on top of the one the in `~/.ignition/fuel` since it might mess up some the paths \(relative vs absolute\).  Therefore, just edit it and apply your changes manually.
content.html: @Paul, check if you have the ssci_x2_sensor_config_1 folder under the~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models directory. If so, then edit the model.sdf file there and add your changes for the camera angle. Do not just copy your local modified version under /subt_ws/ on top of the one the in ~/.ignition/fuel since it might mess up some the paths (relative vs absolute). Therefore, just edit it and apply your changes manually.
